code: import React from'react';import s from"./Paginator.module.css";var Paginator=function Paginator(props){var pagesCount=Math.ceil(props.totalUsersCount/props.pageSize);var pages=[];for(var i=1;i<=pagesCount;i++){pages.push(i);}return React.createElement("ul",{className:s.pagination},pages.map(function(p){if(p>=parseInt(props.currentPage)-2&&p<=parseInt(props.currentPage)+2||p===pagesCount||p===1){return React.createElement("li",{key:p,onClick:function onClick(){props.setCurrentPage(p);},className:p===parseInt(props.currentPage)?s.selected_page:''},p);}else if(p<=parseInt(props.currentPage)+5&&p>=parseInt(props.currentPage)-5){return React.createElement("li",{key:p},".");}return null;}));};export default Paginator;
